product_name: Case Cutlery ARL Dark Oak Mini Copperhead Knife
long_description: The ARL Mini Copperhead Knife features a multipurpose steel clip blade and a versatile pen blade for everyday use around the house or in the woods. The beautiful reclaimed-wood handle adds appeal.
short_description: The ARL Mini Copperhead Knife features a multipurpose steel clip blade and a versatile pen blade for everyday use around the house or in the woods. The beautiful reclaimed-wood handle adds appeal.
